info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:11PM EDT until June 16 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN NOTTOWAY AND AMELIA COUNTIES... At 210 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jetersville, or 9 miles north of Crewe, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Jetersville around 220 PM EDT. Morven around 225 PM EDT. Amelia Courthouse around 235 PM EDT. Chula around 245 PM EDT. Scotts Fork around 250 PM EDT. Mannboro around 300 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Paineville, Maplewood, Fergusonville, Earls, Deatonville, Rodophil, Truxillo, Denaro and Winterham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
